## Generated by ChatGPT - so who knows how well it will work, seems logical tho

project_root/
|-- data/                  # Store your game data and generated GAN data
|   |-- raw/               # Raw data (if any)
|   |-- processed/         # Processed data ready for training
|   |-- generated/         # Data generated by GAN
|
|-- src/
|   |-- game/              # Pygame-based game code
|   |   |-- assets/        # Game assets (images, sounds, etc.)
|   |   |-- levels/        # Game levels
|   |   |-- entities.py    # Game entities (player, enemies, etc.)
|   |   |-- game.py        # Main game logic
|
|   |-- gan/               # GAN-related code
|   |   |-- model/         # GAN model architecture
|   |   |-- train.py       # Script for training the GAN
|   |   |-- generate.py    # Script for using the trained GAN to generate levels
|
|   |-- utils/             # Utility functions used across the project
|   |   |-- data_loader.py # Data loading functions
|   |   |-- preprocessing.py# Data preprocessing functions
|   |   |-- visualization.py# Functions for visualizing data or results
|
|-- notebooks/             # Jupyter notebooks for exploration and analysis
|
|-- requirements.txt       # Project dependencies
|-- README.md              # Project documentation
|-- LICENSE                # License information
|-- .gitignore             # Git ignore file
|-- main.py                # Main script to run the game and integrate GAN-generated levels
